com.compendium.core.db
Class DBNode

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBNode

public class DBNode
extends java.lang.Object

The DBNode class serves as the interface layer between the Node Services objects and the Node table in the database.

Author:
rema and sajid / Michelle Bachler / Lakshmi Prabhakaran

htCheckViews

private static java.util.Hashtable htCheckViews
Used to check for maps within maps and stop never-ending loop.

                                 java.util.Date creationDate,
                                 java.util.Date modificationDate,
                                 java.lang.String userID)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new node in the database, creates a new NodeSummary object and returns it.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
id, - the node id.
type, - the node type.
xNodeType, - the extended node type - not currently used.
importedId, - the current id of the node being imported.
sOriginalID, - the original imported of this link.
author, - the author of this link.
label, - the label of the node.
detail, - the first detail page of the node.
creationDate, - the date of creation of the node.
modificationDate, - the date of modification of the node.
Returns:
com.compendium.core.datamode.INodeSummary, the node object.

java.sql.SQLException

delete

public static boolean delete(DBConnection dbcon,
                             NodeSummary node,
                             java.lang.String sViewID,
                             java.lang.String userID,
                             java.util.Vector vtUsers)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Deletes the node with the given id from the database. This function marks the node as deleted in the database. The physical deletion happens with the 'purge' method.

Parameters:
dbcon - the DBConnection object to access the database with.
node - the node Summary reference.
sViewID - the id of the node's containing view from which it is to be deleted.
userID - the id of the user who is doing this insert.
vtUsers - a list of all UserProfile objects so we don't delete their HomeView, inbox etc.
Returns:
boolean value, returns true if this was the last instance of the node and therefore it was marked for deletion, else returns false if just removed from view.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sNodeID, - the id of the view node to return the detail page for.
nPageNode, - the number of the detail page to return.
Returns:
com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodeDetailPage, the page of detail as requested else null.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

processNode

protected static NodeSummary processNode(DBConnection dbcon,
                                         java.sql.ResultSet rs,
                                         java.lang.String sUserID)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
Helper method to extract and build a node object from a result set item. the ResultSet item is expected to contains the follow fields in the following order: NodeID, Type, ExtendedNodeType, OriginalID, Author, CreationDate, ModificationDate, Label, DEtail, LastModAuthor.

Parameters:
dbcon - the DBConnection object to access the database with.
rs - the ResultsSet to process to create the link from a query.
sUserID - the id of the user getting this data.
Returns:
com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodeSummary, the NodeSummary object created from the passed data.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
